mapper.sql: PatientID, AppointNumber, Appointtime, AppointStatus, number, DoctorID
mapper.select: select count(*) from appointrecord where DoctorID=#{doctorid}

select DoctorID,AppointNumber,appointinfo.PatientID,Appointtime,AppointStatus,appointinfo.number from appointinfo ,appointrecord where appointinfo.PatientID=#{patientid} and appointrecord.PatientID=#{patientid}
mapper.insert: insert into appointrecord (AppointNumber, PatientID, Appointtime, AppointStatus, number,DoctorID) values (#{appointnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patientid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appointtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appointstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), #{doctorid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into appointrecord

mapper.update:
update appointrecord
AppointNumber = #{appointnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Appointtime = #{appointtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AppointStatus = #{appointstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
number = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DoctorID = #{doctorid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where PatientID = #{patientid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
